description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9k90d","text":"This is a protocol for the preparation of Lentiviruses.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bb462","text":"1. HEK293T medium @4C lasts for 1 month. A total of 500 mL:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4mj32","text":"435 ml DMEM (High glucose, GlutaMAX) (Thermo Fisher Scientific) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c3215","text":"50 ml Fetal bovine serum (FBS) (Thermo Fisher Scientific) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ba9fl","text":"5 ml Penicillin-Streptomycin (Thermo Fisher Scientific) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"evefl","text":"5 ml HEPES (1M; Thermo Fisher Scientific)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2v66n","text":"5 ml Sodium pyruvate (100 mM; Thermo Fisher Scientific)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5i069","text":"Sterilized by filtration through a 0.22 µm filter","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"578up","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fmu8a","text":"2. Virus medium @4C lasts for 1 month. A total of 500 mL:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"kn3q","text":"470 ml DMEM (High glucose, GlutaMAX) (ThermoFisher Scientific) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7u85e","text":"10 ml Fetal bovine serum (FBS) (Thermo Fisher Scientific) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2h72u","text":"5 ml Penicillin-Streptomycin (Thermo Fisher Scientific) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"634ke","text":"5 ml MEM NEAA (100X; Thermo Fisher Scientific)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aatd3","text":"5 ml HEPES (1M; Thermo Fisher Scientific)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8chu3","text":"5 ml Sodium pyruvate (100 mM; Thermo Fisher Scientific)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5bbjg","text":"0.5 ml beta-mercaptoethanol (Thermo Fisher Scientific)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2u1uh","text":"Sterilized by filtration through a 0.22 µm filter","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"njo2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"afcnm","text":"3. OptiMEM+GlutaMAX (Thermo Fisher Scientific)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"32jql","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dnddu","text":"4. Lipofectamine 2000 (Thermo Fisher Scientific)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8n2dm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"btsed","text":"5. Plasmids:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ukp1","text":"Transfer: FUW-M2rtTA (Addgene plasmid# 20342), pTet-O-Ngn2-puro (Addgene plasmid# 52047), Tet-O-FUW-Ascl1 (Addgene plasmid# 27150), Tet-O-FUW-Brn2 (Addgene plasmid# 27151), Tet-O-FUW-Myt1l (Addgene plasmid# 27152)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8j6mg","text":"Packaging: psPAX2 (Addgene plasmid# 12260)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"76cvp","text":"Envelope: pMD2.G (Addgene plasmid# 12259) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bakv3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ev1q","text":"6. Millex syringe 0.22 \u0026 0.45 µm filter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6jskd","text":"Seed 6x106 HEK293T cells in a 10-cm dish for each transfer plasmid and culture to reach 80% confluence next day.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":9,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"kl9n","text":"Prepare DNA and Lipofectamine 2000 dilutions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2msb6","text":"5 µg Transfer plasmid","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ee61q","text":"4 µg Packaging plasmid","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6qdes","text":"2.5 µg Envelope plasmid","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ivri","text":"DNA diluted into 300 µL OptiMEM","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"31v4","text":"23 µL Lipofectamine 2000, diluted into 300 µL OptiMEM","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"t8ks","text":"Vortex DNA and Lipofectamine dilutions, centrifuge for 5 sec and incubate at room temperature for 5 mins.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4dtiu","text":"Combine DNA and Lipofectamine dilutions, vortex, centrifuge and incubate the mixture for additional 15 mins.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2otjs","text":"Remove old HEK293T medium, rinse the cells with OptiMEM once and then add 5 mL OptiMEM to each dish.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cvit1","text":"Add a total of 600 µL of Lipofectamine/DNA mixture to the cells dropwise across the whole dish, gently shake in vertical × horizontal direction a few times and return the dishes to the incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"28ien","text":"After 6-hr incubation, remove the transfection medium and add 9 mL of fresh Virus medium to each dish.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1310t","text":"For additional 24-hr incubation, collect the viral particle-containing medium from each dish and store at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2n2a3","text":"After medium collection, add fresh 8 mL of pre-warm Virus medium to each dish.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"91oql","text":"After 24-hr incubation, collect the medium and pool it with the first collection.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"31lf2","text":"The cells can now be bleached and disposed of accordingly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4pvsd","text":"Seal the pooled medium with parafilm and centrifuge in the swinging bucket at 400xG for 5 mins at 4°C to pellet cell debris.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dlv9r","text":"Carefully take the cleared supernatant and pass through a 0.45 µm filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eript","text":"Viral supernatant is stored at 4°C until use and good for 2 weeks.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Lentivirus preparation for neuronal transdifferentiation
